bio.name: Md Shafi
bio.intro1: Hello, I'm Shafi, a Software Developer with frontend expertise from India. I develop and craft web elements for clients across different locations. I like work with new people. New people new Experiences.
bio.intro2: Fluent in JavaScript libraries such as React.js & Next.js, popular frameworks including Material-UI & Bootstrap, and Redux for state management. Proficient in core web technologies, including JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and DOM.

about.info1: I improve and refine your online presence. Your website acts as the main entry point to your business and a key source of revenue.
about.info2: Design and build custom digital solutions tailored to meet the clients' needs, ensuring seamless functionality and user-friendly experiences.
about.info3: Seamlessly blend UI/UX design principles with cutting-edge technologies to elevate your digital products.

experience.workInfo: Worked for Ebay Inc. as a Technical specialist and Customer support.
Designing Android mobile app using React Native framework & Typescript.

Focused on creating user-friendly web interfaces designed specifically for healthcare solutions. Specializing in layout design with MUI and Next.js to seamlessly integrate their functionalities. Collaborated with an accomplished team to work on API integration & Deployment.

Integrating TRPC and Prisma in a Next.js environment, and actively gaining hands-on experience by creating and modifying Prisma models. Additionally, collaborating on the modification and expansion of the existing frontend ( using React, Next.js and MaterialUI), incorporating new features as required.
